parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.68

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Flags

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns flag position on the flag pole in range of 0..1, where 0 is bottom of the flag pole, 1 is the top of the flag pole. The result is local to the PC on which command is executed

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''flagAnimationPhase''' flag

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> flag: [[Object]] - flag pole of the type "FlagCarrier"

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>  [[Number]] - 0...1
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[flagAnimationPhase]] _flag1; //0.5</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[flag]], [[flagOwner]], [[setFlagSide]], [[setFlagTexture]], [[flagSide]], [[flagTexture]], [[setFlagAnimationPhase]], [[forceFlagTexture]], [[getForcedFlagTexture]], [[Flag Textures]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
